body:
So, recently we've been having a lot of troubles in getting our team working on projects. Team members say they can make it on to the server on (this day) at (this time) however only 1/4th of the team shows up, and when they do nothing gets done. 

Due to this reason, I will be recruiting new members to the Raging Incorporated Build Team. Yes, I've made a post about this before. However, we have a big build that is supposed to be done by Christmas day, and we've barely even started it yet. No, this message is not to bring down any members of our team. We consist of members who truly have a talent in building. However the work ethic, has truly gone downhill.

So if you'd like to apply for a spot on Raging Incorporated, please fill out the application form below!

Application for Raging Incorporated Minecraft Build Team:

How do you feel you would benefit the build team?

Do you have any past experience in building? (If so, please list below)

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly?

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?

Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team?

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below:

Anything else you'd like to add that would benefit your application?

Thanks for reading! If you're interested, I strongly encourage you to apply. More information about the team and any questions needed to be asked will be discussed personally on Skype.

Regards, -Jake

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly? it depends on how much i get to work iwth people. Probably like 8-9 hours.

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?
Kind of. Ill try a lot harder to reply to you guys.

Application for Raging Incorporated Minecraft Build Team:

How do you feel you would benefit the build team?:I have a creative mind when It comes to most things. I can spend alot of time building maps because I belive that it is alot of fun to contribute to the avicus server.

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly? 2-3-4 hrs maby more

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages? Yes I go on skype Before school, During school, after school, And when Im in bed

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below: http://imgur.com/a/Snc0m that some pics of what I recently built.

Anything else you'd like to add that would benefit your application? Im sexy and I know it....

replies.body:
How do you feel you would benefit the build team?
I am an exceptional builder, and a fairly active user, seeing as I am on holidays.
I can help participate with things such as interior decoration, or pixel art related builds :)

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly?
Being that I am on holidays, and having a very lenient active time on electronic devices, I can put asside hours of my time working.

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?
Yes, my Skype is always open, and I normally always respond to new messages, with the exception of sleep, that is.

Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team?
i wish to apply for a spot mainly because I love building, and I love collaborating with people, I also have a lot of time to kill.

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below: 
http://imgur.com/a/FSmOU#0
http://imgur.com/a/ydekd#0
http://imgur.com/a/ZcoL3#0
http://imgur.com/a/8Z79n#0
http://imgur.com/a/LNiks#0

Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team? I'm bored and I always have nobody to build maps with. I love building and I will never stop and I would like to build with others to see how to improve on building.

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below:

replies.body:
Application for Raging Incorporated Minecraft Build Team:

How do you feel you would benefit the build team?
Creative building in Minecraft is my outstanding skill. I have been on build teams before, and I make it my priority to respond to a command.

Do you have any past experience in building? (If so, please list below)
Fyreuk Build Team: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_LpT_Is7G0k

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly?
I'm on vacation from school, so I can possibly put in 1-6 hours of dedication.

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?
I keep my skype on all the time while I am on my computer. I will be alert for any urgent messages.
EDIT: If you are looking for my Skype, it is: trexdomobutter
Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team?
Avicus is my main pvp server that I play on. To be able to build for it and help serve it using my skills would be an honor.

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below:
Nordic Holiday Map (currently in rots):http://imgur.com/a/QWY2e
Medieval Mansion: http://imgur.com/a/s00qt

Anything else you'd like to add that would benefit your application?

reply_to.body: Eric please be more professional and mature when making an application! Thank You!
reply_to.body_tagged: Eric please be more professional and mature when making an application! Thank You!

replies.body:
[Only if you guys are active in building again]

Application for Raging Incorporated Minecraft Build Team: 

How do you feel you would benefit the build team?
Well, I think I would benefit the team by my past experiences. I started building along time ago, and continue on. I hope to get better and better by collaborating with others and help out. I'm very active, and I like to build alot in my spare time. I've also been apart of Raging Incorporation in the past, which reflected on helping my building skills, by a major advantage! I hope to work with some friends again x3

Do you have any past experience in building? (If so, please list below)
Yes, I do have past experience in building. I've been in Raging Incorporation before, Team Archeon, Team Charmy and some teams with about 1 or 2 people, just for fun xP. From experience, I know that we built Flowdren as a group building in Rage Inc. Which was quite a success, and I wish to continue. 

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly? I am frequently active, so about... 3 to 4 hours on building if I don't have anything else to do.

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?
Yes, I reqularly am active on skype. I do answer messages quite fast, if there was a urgent one. You can ask Pod about that.
Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team?
Well lately, I haven't been building much. Mostly because I get bored when i'm building on my own. I work better when I have support, and cooperate well with others.

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below:
http://avicus.net/forums/b81c481de
http://avicus.net/forums/fe3c9a845 - Rage Inc (Flowdren)
http://avicus.net/forums/ac0fc1436
http://avicus.net/forums/29a028a6e
http://avicus.net/forums/3b2de0f65
http://avicus.net/forums/271d1f3e5
http://avicus.net/forums/c38835b83
http://avicus.net/forums/f29ad0b81 - Team Charmy (Aquarium)
http://avicus.net/forums/c97f4de40
http://avicus.net/forums/f8a0dfc71
http://avicus.net/forums/f704d3059 - Dux hax (Uprising Hills)

Theres many more, but they were on the old Avicus forums :(
I've been improving on building, and I hope to be better.

Anything else you'd like to add that would benefit your application?
Hm... I've built maps with other people in Rage Inc, so I can collaborate better with them. That should be about it.

Thanks, and have a wonderful day! :D

replies.body: Is the current Build Team all the Devs then?
replies.body_tagged: Is the current Build Team all the Devs then?

replies.body:
How do you feel you would benefit the build team?
Work ethic going downhill? My work ethic isn't bad! If I enjoy doing something, I'll be very dedicated! x3 I'm (usually) amiable, you know I'm mature and helpful.. most of the time, and as long as I know what we're doing, I'll be happy to work until I can't work anymore.

Do you have any past experience in building? (If so, please list below)
I have a lot of experience in moral support! ;) In all seriousness, I’ve assisted in maps, and I build spawns for myself in my free time. I tend to start projects, then never finish them. Oops x3

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly?
Oh, there’s a wiiiiide range for this one. I have way too much free time, so I generally play Minecraft 8-ish hours a day. I’d say 10 hours a week maybe, Possibly more.

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?
Yup. I have a second monitor for a reason. ;) 11pm-9am EST is when I won’t respond right away… I sleep a lot c: As long as I am on my computer and/or phone, I have access to Skype. x)

Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team?
I like building. I have difficulty finishing projects by myself. :P Plus I think it would be really fun! x3 And you need people, ye? If I can help you, then that's always good!

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below:
http://i.imgur.com/qLjt32o.png I dabble in floor building. 
http://i.imgur.com/xXK7gLE.png Back when building maps identical to Ternio and Quintus were a thing, I made this. I only made a frame for yellow team, though. Sucks to only have SPC :P
EDIT: Since I can add a third photo, http://i.imgur.com/w2ItyAi.png I like making monuments look spiffy! For some reason, on that world I couldn't toggle downfall, so I made a little roof x3 Ignore it :P

Anything else you'd like to add that would benefit your application?
You never have to worry about my behavior being bad. After all, I’m staff on both Avicus and Overcast. :P  And although this doesn’t exactly improve my chances at being accepted, it’s something to consider; I’m not the best at making buildings. I can terraform.. kinda, and I can make floors. Can't do buildings.

I don't expect to be accepted, due to slight inactivity, and my subpar building skill, but you did say that work ethic is a big thing you are looking for, which I do have. :P

replies.body:
How do you feel you would benefit the build team? I'm really good at building, awesome at terraforming, and I've made a large amount of maps for the server.

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly?
2 hours; more can be added if viable.
Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?
Yes, quite easily actually.

Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team? Because i would like to share my ideas with a large group of people and gain help on my maps when I am making them.

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below: 
  • Link 1
  • Link 2
  • Link 3
  • Link 4
Anything else you'd like to add that would benefit your application?
I am a very open-minded and kind person. I won't shut others' ideas down.

replies.body:
Aye Mr, I'd be happy to be apart of your build team.

How do you feel you would benefit the build team?
I feel I'd help the build team by bringing forth my  artistic values such as an eye for detail, creativity, etc. I'm open to any ideas and suggestions but can be critical in order to maintain a high standard for the team.

Do you have any past experience in building? (If so, please list below)
I'm a member of Keralis' creative server which one must apply and supply images of their builds in order to be accepted therefore I do have past experience in building. I have also built a few maps for Avicus.

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly? 
The hours I'm willing to put in are as followed.
Holidays: 16h approx.
Non-Holidays: 11h Approx. 
Note: I'm really not sure at this point in time as I will be doing time consuming subjects during 2015.

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?
Yes, I'm regularly on and able to answer urgent messages.

Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team?
I'd like to be apart of the build team to further enhance my design skills and improve the overall quality of Avicus' builds. I'd like to improve my design skills as I'd  I think it would be great to work with the team overall. 

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below:
http://imgur.com/ZqqG5R8&GlRKfFD&sHFLm6P&KUXhEll&Z0ULD8h&5uHDZ5b&rm1rpWa&PgecUre&W1kBLjG&JEWD2Uo&mrZUOGz&DwLWBAJ 

http://imgur.com/a/qVAdu/all

Anything else you'd like to add that would benefit your application?
I'm currently doing "VISCOM" which stands for Visual Communications and Design, a technical drawing type of subject where you cover a range of Visual design strategies such as Orthogonal, perspective, isometric, free-hand, etc drawings. Also I'm quite handy with Photoshop.

I feel I'd help the build team by bringing forth my  artistic values such as an eye for detail, creativity, etc. I'm open to any ideas and suggestions but can be critical in order to maintain a high standard for the team.

Do you have any past experience in building? (If so, please list below)
I'm a member of Keralis' creative server which one must apply and supply images of their builds in order to be accepted therefore I do have past experience in building. I have also built a few maps for Avicus.

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly? 
The hours I'm willing to put in are as followed.
Holidays: 16h approx.
Non-Holidays: 11h Approx. 
Note: I'm really not sure at this point in time as I will be doing time consuming subjects during 2015.

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?
Yes, I'm regularly on and able to answer urgent messages.

Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team?
I'd like to be apart of the build team to further enhance my design skills and improve the overall quality of Avicus' builds. I'd like to improve my design skills as I'd  I think it would be great to work with the team overall. 

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below:
http://imgur.com/ZqqG5R8&GlRKfFD&sHFLm6P&KUXhEll&Z0ULD8h&5uHDZ5b&rm1rpWa&PgecUre&W1kBLjG&JEWD2Uo&mrZUOGz&DwLWBAJ 

http://imgur.com/a/qVAdu/all

Anything else you'd like to add that would benefit your application?
I'm currently doing "VISCOM" which stands for Visual Communications and Design, a technical drawing type of subject where you cover a range of Visual design strategies such as Orthogonal, perspective, isometric, free-hand, etc drawings. Also I'm quite handy with Photoshop.

replies.body:
Application for Raging Incorporated Minecraft Build Team (If spots are still available):

How do you feel you would benefit the build team?I am imaginative and believe myself to be a good builder, I would try to work for as long as I can on any builds you require.

Do you have any past experience in building? (If so, please list below)Yes, I'm currently building for a server owned by my friends and I. I also just like going into creative single player and messing around with the new blocks etc...

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly?Holidays: 2-4 (varies) School terms: 1 (most probable)

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?I would do my very best

Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team?I believe that I am imaginative and a good builder, I work well in a team and am very co-operative. If work ethic is going down in the team, I think that I would be able to provide a boost and I am dedicated to anything that I enjoy (just so happens that I enjoy building).

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below:Unavailable to screenshot my photos from a server I have been building on, will try later as it is down.

Anything else you'd like to add that would benefit your application?I've been on a few build teams in the past and I'm helping to create a sever with my friends where I am the major part of the building of spawns, maps etc... I hope you consider me to join the build team as I would love a chance just to show that I would be a great addition.

replies.body:
How do you feel you would benefit the build team?
I'm creative, cooperative, hardworking, and would consider myself to be a skilled builder. I have a lot of experience working with build teams, so I believe I am ideally suited to this task.

Do you have any past experience in building?
Yes, most notable among these would be I was accepted into an elite build community know as WesterosCraft, and have worked with then for over 2 years.

If you are accepted, how many hours of work are you willing to put in weekly? 
A few hours a week, 3-5 most likely. However, in the holidays I can be on for about 6 hours a day if needed.

Do you go on Skype regularly and are able to respond to urgent messages?
I have and check Skype fairly regularly, I also use TS.

Why do you want to apply for a spot on the team?
I'm interested in joining a group of other skilled builders to make maps for Avicus.

In order to see the quality of your builds, please link me to a picture to 1-3 of them below:
- Build 1: A towerhouse and hamlet which I built, obviously not a mini-game map, but it shows the quality of my building. If you wish, here is a link to a video of this build (although I didn't make the video). Picture link.
- Build 2: A Nebula map I made quite some time ago, although I still think it is a good reflection of my skill. Picture 1 and Picture 2.

Anything else you'd like to add that would benefit your application?
I am skilled in both WorldEdit and VoxelSniper, and have used it extensively in multiplayer environments.

Regards, Blue
